item.title: About
item.description: Born and raised in El Sauzal Rodríguez, Pablo Robeldo and his crew know Baja better than anyone. It’s important to know the land you work on and how the weather is going to effect the structure. With a lifetime of experience, he knows how to build a cabin on the pennisula that will last. Custom craftsmanship and smart design. Let us build you a house that will stand the test of time!
